direct_answer.text: To find out how many sheets of paper Miguel uses per month, first we need to know how many sheets are on one pad: 2 sheets/week * 52 weeks/year / 2 pads/year = 104 sheets/pad. With 104 sheets per pad, Miguel uses 208 sheets (2 pads) per week. And since there are 4 weeks in a month on average, he uses 208 * 4 = 832 sheets per month. The answer is: 832.
